documents.document: Today is one of those days where I am wearing a jumper t-shirt combo rather than a shirt cos I simply can't be bothered to iron. Go me.
Hard-pushed to find a tweet on my timeline that's not about someone who rhymes with pump.
Gonna wash my face with coffee this morning.
Not enough sleep dot com
@langcatlocke Tell them I've had a look at the HTML source code for the website and it appears to be simply characters input in error.
@langcatlocke Similar situation on the heading of the Contact Us page. I'm viewing it via Chrome on Android phone. May be browser specific.
@langcatlocke Hey Mark, noticed your profile on your company's website has a couple of text malformations. Ask your… https://t.co/Idux6Lxpda
#MakeAFilmMundane The Weevil's Dead.
#MakeAFilmMundane Fight Club 18-30
I think there's been a terrible mix up. All @realDonaldTrump done was simply replying to his General's email about The Fugees. Or something.
Now that's what I call a headline! #cnn #trump https://t.co/02DFdbfuK3
just finished a Runtastic run of 7.55 mi in 1h 18m with the #Runtastic PRO app: https://t.co/Osz7WmZKIM
When you find yourself slapping the arse of a statue. That's when you know you've hit rock bottom.
My 15 yr old daughter throw me a Minstrel across the living room and it bopped me in the eyeball! She couldn't manage it again if she tried!
I've got a sore throat every time I swallow. I suppose stopping that will solve things. Swallectomey
Just back from #Odeon after watching #T2trainspotting with the good lady. Choose Wife.
@VodafoneUKhelp Got unlock code but no alternative sim available. Can't I just unlock with a dial code instead of other sim?
The reaction on the face of @realDonaldTrump every time he was asked a question by British journalists was priceless - disbelief & contempt.
BBC Detective drinks this evening. @ Prestonpans https://t.co/Nc0lqW4Xfx
@IrvineWelsh Was a bit disappointed that @schwarzenneger wasn't in it. #T2trainspotting
The latter half of this working day Friday for me is to take part in a corporate 'listen to the boss tell us how great we are' type thing.
Rush around. Keys - yup, wallet - yup, phone - yup, lunch... Rush rush. Get into car..Takes AGES to defrost! Gah! All that effort wasted.
When will seamstresses learn that adding another letter "s" to the word needles is needless.
Been up half an hour. Had cereal and coffee and coughed 50 times. I gotta get my priorities right.
@spadoll Nope. Long haired moustachio Greek (I think) synth composer
I'm feeling a bit generous - @realDonaldTrump and Bill Clinton can have an impeach.
Anne Diamond is grammatically incorrect.
@spadoll He was in that Bond movie Yanni Live Twice
If #DonaldTrump bowed to public pressure & steps down wouldn't that ultimately be a hollow victory for democracy? You can't just remove him.
I think #Trump awful but wonder where all this protestation is ultimately aiming to end up? Impeached? What does that say about democracy?
just finished a Runtastic walking activity of 3 mi in 51m 28s with the #Runtastic PRO app: https://t.co/oNcWpbzPg9
That small feeling of chuffedness when the bus you want turns up just as you get to the stop.
I'm wondering if I should write a scathing letter about #brexit to @MailOnline under the pseudonym of Mr R Tickle (50)...
I consider @realDonaldTrump being in power to be a particular form of torture many have to endure.
Been awake since 3am coughing and wheezing like a 19th century Coal Miner. Suffering from manflu whilst watching nighttime telly is woeful.
Just been mistaken for a @on_lothianbuses driver by lady waiting for the actual driver to return from the loo. Cos I have a black jacket on.
Since becoming @POTUS #DonaldTrump is actually quite fed up of all the insects in the White House. He's sycophants.
However, I've just had a cunning plan to build a spreadsheet for work that, if I pull it off, will make me out to be a superstar.
Lying in bed coughing and wheezing, having ravenously ate a sympathy bar of #dairymilk like a chocoholic pensioner. #manflu
@santanderukhelp Bit of trial and error has confirmed that as of today's date, the earliest date the app will show… https://t.co/VMUAsIyb53
I've got one of those wheezy chest infections where will guarantee a coughing fit if you take anything more than a small intake of breath.
@santanderukhelp I once had it but saw no real benefit from it.
@santanderukhelp Yes for current month as normal. But wanted to look back to Mar 2016 & it says no transactions to… https://t.co/VHT95WOwcN
@casioroee Its not to be sniffed at
@lolwarlol I've always claimed that I can jump higher than a house. Mainly because houses, as we both know, can't jump.
@DrDavieAdam That's my favourite Oasis song.
@lolwarlol Rooms can't laugh.
@KatieMagnet Who you calling Pos Tits?
Drinking cider just to soothe my sore coughy throat. Doctors should prescribe this!
@santanderukhelp Trying to look at my transactions around March 2016 using Android app but says none to display. How come?
@ACLU Quite a few things done by "the white man" are a slap in the face to Native Americans.
Had to use a payphone for the 1st time in many years tonight. Min coin these days - 60p. Yowser! I could talk for hours back in the day!
When you accidentally leave your mobile phone at your mums and she sends a text to let you know... That.

I've got loads of Vaseline!
Yeah, rub it in why don't you!
How strange. I've found myself often disagreeing with my own opinions lately. That's not like me at all.
@VodafoneUKhelp Morning guys. Already sent you a DM re billing query.
How come no matter who's in charge of countries, people always think they're incompetent fools? May, Cameron, Blair, Trump, Bush. None liked
Coughing and wheezing. I can do both. #manflu
just finished a Runtastic run of 8.31 mi in 1h 26m with the #Runtastic PRO app: https://t.co/lr0iGlRmpA
Physically I'm as fit as normal but I have a head cold and a cough. Trying to decide if I should still go for my weekly run.
Got a dilute version of the wife's cold. We're having a coughing competition. She's in the lead.
According to #CNN all across the US, massive women are rallying against @realDonaldTrump... Does he not like the larger lady?
Her off #cbb that presents it looks like @FirstLadyTRUMP
Thoughts: I’m just too busy during the week - I’ll get it done at the weekend. Weekend - SLOB! #rinseandrepeat
just finished a Runtastic walking activity of 3.57 mi in 58m 16s with the #Runtastic PRO app: https://t.co/Osz7WmZKIM
Look on the bright side. Slightly less than 4 years left to go now. #inauguration #DonaldTrump
@girl_guide No but grey bearded and haggard.
Just watched #Eastenders for the first time in ages. When did they replace Phil Mitchell with his dad?
Watching #JudgeJudy and a woman was on screen with the word Plaintiff above her. I didn't think she was all that bad, actually.
I have #Pointless on in the background and have no idea how the show works.
@2010LeeHurst If only they'd sent us all a mailshot...
SuperTed would often steal stuff for his grandmother with no regard for the consequences. He would take things for granted.

@angell2101 his socks
Have had 3 beers and some soup and now I am useless. #lightweight
@angell2101 at 15,protein shakes are quite easy to make
Strange feeling reading posts from 5 years ago where I was being nostalgic. Is there a word for post nostalgia?
I don't really rate this random noise generator I've invented. It's utter PARP HONK!
@MitchBenn Are they perhaps advocating LSD?
I'm lying down and it's dark. When does unconsciousness happen? I'll probably fall asleep waiting for it.
@achrisevans They're quite nice sports cars though.
If you need a computer microchip to watch the Athletics, try Athlon.
@richardosman @robbeckettcomic Osman Citt/Utd depending on which you loathe the least.
Wife given a free bottle of wine for holding the fort at work when Environmental Health popped by for a routine inspection. Half to me!

Woman just got on this bus and complained to the driver that she's late. I'm sensing a bout of shoulder shrugging in response.
Saw the word "mwah" written down earlier. Made me laugh maniacly. Mwah haha!
How long after a programme is shown on the BBC is it available on #iplayer?
Lots of people haven't died this year. More people than last year.
